title: [Ta'Illistim, Kaerinar Wey]
description: Several elves loiter outside a small grey slate-clad shop, smoking cigars and conversing jovially amongst themselves.  The shop's thick blue tiled roof gleams dully in the light.  An engraved faenor plaque swings from the doorpost.

Several elves loiter outside a small grey slate-clad shop, smoking cigars and conversing quietly amongst themselves.  The shop's thick blue tiled roof gleams dully in the moonlight.  An engraved faenor plaque swings from the doorpost.

The wavery glass windows of a small smokeshop are tinged a pale brown, each sill coated with a sticky film.  Next to the arched doorway a plaque is inset, along with a metallic leaf.  The shop's blue-tiled roof is pierced by two small smokestacks.
